amendment.description: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to enhance beneficiary access to quality health care services in rural areas under the medicare program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 594 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 86 - 12. Record Vote Number: 156.

action.text: Amendment SA 594 proposed by Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR S6200-6201) To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to enhance beneficiary access to quality health care services in rural areas under the medicare program.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 594 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 86 - 12. Record Vote Number: 156.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 594 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 86 - 12. Record Vote Number: 156.
